definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack

pinyin: san1 jian4 tao4 shi4 xi1 zhuang1

sentences.english: ONE highly-skilled legal professional and one man in a very expensive suit.
sentences.chinese: 一个高级法律顾问和一个穿着非常昂贵的西装的男人。

sentences.english: The joke finally made the man in a suit smile.
sentences.chinese: 玩笑最终让这个穿着西装的人有了点笑意。

sentences.english: If the suit is buttoned, where should be the stickpin?
sentences.chinese: 西装系著扣时，领带夹应在衬衫的哪两粒钮扣之间？

sentences.english: Ever since armies began dressing in Western-style uniforms, men around the world have adapted Western-style work clothes.
sentences.chinese: 自从军队开始穿上西装，世上的男人已经接受了西装。

sentences.english: Ever since armies began dressing in Western-style uniforms, men around the world have adapted Western-style work clothes.
sentences.chinese: 自从军队开始穿上西装，世上的男人已经接受了西装。

sentences.english: Ladies Dress, Suitings, Shirtings, Curtains and bedsheets.
sentences.chinese: 女式服装和西装料，衬衫面料，窗帘和床单。

sentences.english: I"ve never had any that Ilike better."
sentences.chinese: 我起根没有这么喜欢的西装。

sentences.english: I'm looking for a pinstriped suit with a 34 waist.
sentences.chinese: 我在找一套腰围34细条纹的西装。

sentences.english: The company regulates that men should wear a suit and tie in business meeting.
sentences.chinese: 公司规定男士在商业会议上必须穿西装打领带。

sentences.english: The whole suit took 600 man hours to make. (Click on the above link to see the bejeweled suit.)
Mr. Hendrickson isn't in favor of mixing beards and business suits either.
sentences.chinese: 亨德里克森也不赞成留着胡子而穿西装。

sentences.english: The young women are dressed in kimonos and the young men are in suits and ties.
sentences.chinese: 这个年轻的女人穿和服和少年的男子在西装和领带。

sentences.english: Double-breasted suit jackets should always have peak lapels.
sentences.chinese: 双排扣男西装夹克应该是峰状翻领。

sentences.english: This one was dressed in a suit and carried a small suitcase.
sentences.chinese: 那人穿着西装，手里还提着个小提箱。

sentences.english: This is Matthew. Has my suit been tailored yet?
sentences.chinese: 我是马修。请问我的西装缝好了没有？

sentences.english: The Cheap nike shoes costless fast suit is severely an extraordinary sneaker.
sentences.chinese: 快速的西装是免费的耐克运动鞋严重不寻常的。

definition: woman's suit/dress worn over a petticoat
ceremonial robe/formal attire (dinner suit, evening gown etc)
